mapper.select: select * from( SELECT aa.*,rownum rnum FROM ( select bpayment.bpaynum ordernum,borderdate,bfinalmoney,delfee,bstatus,mname,receiver from (select TO_DATE(borderdate,'YY/MM/DD') borderdate,bpaynum,bfinalmoney,delfee,bstatus,receiver,mnum from bpayment where mnum=#{mnum} and TO_CHAR(BORDERDATE,'YY/MM/DD') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDay},'YY/MM/DD'),'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(BORDERDATE,'YY/MM/DD')<= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDay},'YY/MM/DD'),'YY/MM/DD') and bstatus>=0 and bstatus<=4)bpayment, (select * from members)members where members.mnum=bpayment.mnum order by borderdate desc ) aa ) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}

select NVL(count(*),0) from (select TO_DATE(borderdate,'YY/MM/DD') borderdate,bpaynum,bfinalmoney,delfee,bstatus,receiver,mnum from bpayment where mnum=#{mnum} and TO_CHAR(BORDERDATE,'YY/MM/DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDay},'YY/MM/DD'),'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDay},'YY/MM/DD'),'YY/MM/DD') order by borderdate desc )bpayment, (select * from members)members where members.mnum=bpayment.mnum
select btype,bnum from paymentbook where bpaynum=#{bpaynum} and rownum=1
select count(*) from paymentbook where bpaynum=#{bpaynum}
select btitle from books where bnum=#{bnum}
select obname,obstatus from oldbooks where obnum=#{bnum}

select pb.bpaynum,pb.bnum,pb.point,pb.bcount,books.bprice,btitle,paymentbook_num pbnum from (select * from paymentbook where bpaynum=#{bpaynum})pb, (select bprice,bnum,btitle from books )books where books.bnum=pb.bnum

select bp.bpaynum,bp.borderdate,mid,mname,receiver,bphone,baddr,delfee,bfinalmoney,methodpayment,usedpoint,bpaydate,bstatus from (select * from bpayment where bpaynum=#{bpaynum})bp, (select * from members)m where bp.mnum=m.mnum
